set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)

set(ui_files
    OptionsWidget.ui)

set(sources
    Filter.cpp Filter.h
    OptionsWidget.cpp OptionsWidget.h
    Task.cpp Task.h
    CacheDrivenTask.cpp CacheDrivenTask.h
    Settings.cpp Settings.h)

add_library(export_ STATIC ${sources} ${ui_files})
target_link_libraries(export_ PUBLIC core PRIVATE output dewarping)
# Export include directories for autogenerated UI headers
target_include_directories(export_ PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/export__autogen/include
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

translation_sources(scantailor ${sources} ${ui_files})
